name: common-node-scripts
description: Local package for node scripts that are common across mono-repo projects, to keep things DRY and to isolate their dependecies

scripts.preinstall: [ -e 'node_modules' ] || (mkdir node_modules && npm install) # to work as a local dependency, common_node_scripts needs its node_modules installed before it is 'installed' by any local requier-ers, this enforces that (with just the small annoyance of maybe running install twice if directly working in common_node_scripts

author: Stephen O'Neil
